entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
